title: Fort McHenry National Monument and Historic Shrine: Visitor Centers
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Visitor Centers              Visitor Centers      Fort McHenry  Open  Daily, 9 A.M.-5:45 P.M.  Phone  410/962-4290  Location  Near the park entrance.  Exhibits  New interactive exhibits and movie are featured.   Available Facilities  The gift shop is owned and operated by the Evelyn Hill Corporation. For gift shop information call (410) 625-2330 or write Evelyn Hill Corporation, Fort McHenry NM&HS, 2400 East Fort Avenue, Baltimore, Maryland 21230-5393. Restrooms, water fountain, light refreshments and a public phone are available.
